```{r, echo = TRUE}
#from Lecture 18:
# Loop over rows and columns
m <- matrix(round(runif(20),digits=2),nrow=5)
for (i in 1:nrow(m)) {
for (j in 1:ncol(m)) {
m[i,j] <- m[i,j] + i + j
} # end of column j loop
} # end or row i loop
print(m)
```
